name: auto_less
text: Course instructor controls all settings

name: auto_med
text: The course instructor controls some settings, but the student can change some settings

name: auto_more
text: Student can change all settings

name: uv_more
text: The tutor cannot be designed with a virtual avatar or conversational techniques that mimic a human teacher or tutor

name: uv_med
text: The tutor cannot be designed with a virtual avatar that mimics a human teacher or tutor

name: uv_less
text: The tutor can take on whatever virtual form technologists would like

name: ed_less
text: The tutor conveys emotions

name: ed_med
text: The tutor conveys emotions AND informs the user of what emotion it is expressing

name: ed_more
text: The tutor cannot show emotions

name: databias_more
text: A third-party audit needs to be done to make sure that the data that the tutor uses is representative of the students that will be using it

name: databias_med
text: A third-party audit needs to be done only if the tutor is suspected to be biased

name: databias_less
text: The dataset should not be audited by a third party

name: socialbias_more
text: Someone with tutoring or teaching experience needs to be a part of the team designing the tutor

name: socialbias_med
text: Someone with tutoring or teaching experience needs to be a part of the team designing the tutor OR the team needs to talk to someone with this experience

name: socialbias_less
text: The team does not need someone with tutoring or teaching experience to is involved in the design

name: privacy_less
text: The tutor should remember everything ever said

name: privacy_med
text: The tutor should only remember things that the student tells it to remember

name: privacy_more
text: The tutor remembers nothing

name: sp_less
text: The tutor can suggest other products or features to the student if it thinks the studentâ€™s learning will benefit

name: sp_med
text: The makers of the tutor can suggest other products or features to the student based on the data collection from the tutor if it thinks that the student's learning will benefit

name: sp_more
text: The student cannot be suggested other products or features

name: techno_less
text: There are no limits to what the tutor can help the students with or how

name: techno_med
text: There should be guidelines for what and how the tutor should be helping the students with

name: techno_more
text: There should be restrictions on what the tutor should be helping the students with

name: trans_more
text: The tutor explains why it is making its suggestions

name: trans_less
text: The tutor does not explain why suggestions were made

name: trans_med
text: The tutor only lets the student know why suggestions were made when they ask
